sentences.en: But the way of darkness is crooked, and full of cursing; for it is the way of eternal death with punishment, in which way are the things that destroy the soul, viz.
sentences.ja: しかし、闇の道は曲がった、と呪いに満ちています。それは罰と永遠の死の方法であるため、魂を破壊するものであるように、すなわち。

sentences.en: , idolatry, over-confidence, the arrogance of power, hypocrisy, double-heartedness, adultery, murder, rapine, haughtiness, transgression, deceit, malice, self-sufficiency, poisoning, magic, avarice, want of the fear of God.
sentences.ja: 、偶像崇拝、オーバー自信、神の恐怖の力、偽善、ダブルheartedness、姦通、殺人、強奪、ごう慢さ、罪、詐欺、悪意、自給、中毒、魔法、貪欲、希望の傲慢。

sentences.en: [In this way, too,] are those who persecute the good, those who hate truth, those who love falsehood, those who know not the reward of righteousness, those who cleave not to that which is good, those who attend not with just judgment to the widow and orphan, those who watch not to the fear of God, [but incline] to wickedness, from whom meekness and patience are far off; persons who love vanity, follow after a reward, pity not the needy, labour not in aid of him who is overcome with toil; who are prone to evil-speaking, who know not Him that made them, who are murderers of children, destroyers of the workmanship of God; who turn away him that is in want, who oppress the afflicted, who are advocates of the rich, who are unjust judges of the poor, and who are in every respect transgressors.
sentences.ja: [、あまりにも、このように]良いを迫害する者、真実を憎む者、偽りを愛する人、正義の報酬を知らない人に、良いものにしませ切断人々だけではない出席者たちです温順と忍耐が遠くている誰から未亡人や孤児、邪悪に、神への恐れにない時計[しかし傾斜]人々に判断。虚栄心を愛する者は、労苦によって克服されていない彼の援助で報酬、同情ではない貧しい人々、労働の後に従ってください。彼は子供の殺人者、神の技量の駆逐艦誰であるか、それらを作ったことはない知っている人、悪をするネイティブの傾向がある人。彼は貧しい人々の不当な裁判官である豊富なの擁護者、ある人、被災抑圧者、その希望に誰であるか背を向けると、すべての点の罪人で誰なの。
